name: Cape Man
description:
CAPE MAN, the game where you are a magical cape! Not completely finishes, so I am sure there are a few glitches.  Some levels contain a few blind jumps, as well as confusing ways to pass the level. If you search the entire level, there should be no blind jumps. Pass a level by collecting a gold coin, found at either the end of the level or inside an enemy.

A: Left, D: Right, Space: Jump, Left Click: Shoot
